Text: Oh, and thanks to the person who orignially ripped it, whoever they are.
Since people aren't helping me seed, I'm closing down my client in an hour.
eyyy, you shopuld wait more when i get album i'll seed it to send as much as i got
It seems to be about as well-seeded as you'd expect a Tom Waits record to be now.  Moments after I made that last comment a couple people finished and left it open, so I left it up too.

i would say this is tom waits' best album. les claypool produced this, along with playing in a few of the tracks. its more gritty and aggressive than any of his other works, which have mostly been sad/depressing.

thank you for uploading this.

by the way track 7 is metropolitan glide, not metropolitan guide.

sound quality is fine, dl speed was great. thanks for seeding everyone :D
